conclusion: Liquid will flow out from A, B, C, and D.
Predict which container (E, F, G, or H) it will flow into after passing through baffles.
Container A is green and located at the top left.
Container B is yellow and located next to container A.
Container C is orange and located next to container B.
Container D is pink and located at the top right.
There are baffles of various colors and orientations between the top containers and the bottom containers.
Container E is pink and located at the bottom left.
Container F is white and located next to container E.
Container G is blue and located next to container F.
Container H is green and located at the bottom right.
Liquid from A will flow down and be redirected by the green baffle towards container F.
Liquid from B will flow down and be redirected by the yellow baffle towards container F.
Liquid from C will flow down and be redirected by the orange baffle towards container F.
Liquid from D will flow down and be redirected by the pink baffle towards container F.
All liquid from A, B, C, and D will flow into container F.
